name: Document Type Classification
description: Comprehensive classification of business document types with 10 distinct categories

classes.name: Invoice
classes.description: Bills and invoices for goods or services
examples:
INVOICE #INV-2024-001

Bill To: ABC Corporation
123 Business Ave
New York, NY 10001

Date: January 15, 2024
Due Date: February 14, 2024

Description: Office supplies delivery including printer paper, pens, folders, and desk organizers.

Quantity: 1 lot
Unit Price: $245.50
Total Amount: $245.50

Payment Terms: Net 30 days
Please remit payment within 30 days to avoid late fees.

classes.name: Contract
examples:
EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT

This Employment Agreement is entered into between DataTech Inc. ("Company") and Sarah Johnson ("Employee") effective January 1, 2024.

1. POSITION AND DUTIES
Employee shall serve as Senior Software Engineer and shall perform duties including software development, code review, and technical documentation.

2. COMPENSATION
Employee shall receive an annual salary of $95,000, payable bi-weekly.

3. BENEFITS
Employee is eligible for health insurance, dental coverage, 401(k) matching, and 15 days paid vacation annually.

4. TERMINATION
Either party may terminate this agreement with two weeks written notice.

By signing below, both parties agree to the terms set forth in this agreement.

classes.name: Report
examples:
QUARTERLY FINANCIAL REPORT - Q4 2023

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
TechCorp Inc. achieved strong financial performance in Q4 2023, with revenue growth of 15% year-over-year and improved profit margins.

KEY FINANCIAL METRICS:
- Total Revenue: $2.4M (up 15% from Q4 2022)
- Gross Profit: $1.6M (67% margin)
- Net Income: $485K (20% margin)
- Cash Flow from Operations: $520K

REVENUE BREAKDOWN:
- Software Licenses: $1.8M (75%)
- Professional Services: $400K (17%)
- Support & Maintenance: $200K (8%)

OUTLOOK:
We expect continued growth in Q1 2024 driven by new product launches and expanded market presence.

classes.name: Proposal
examples:
PROJECT PROPOSAL: Digital Marketing Campaign

To: GreenTech Solutions
From: Creative Marketing Agency
Date: April 12, 2024
Proposal #: CMA-2024-078

PROJECT OVERVIEW:
Comprehensive digital marketing campaign to increase brand awareness and lead generation for GreenTech's new solar panel product line.

SCOPE OF WORK:
1. Market Research & Competitor Analysis
2. Brand Positioning Strategy
3. Website Optimization & SEO
4. Social Media Campaign (LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram)
5. Google Ads & PPC Management
6. Content Creation (blogs, videos, infographics)
7. Email Marketing Automation
8. Performance Analytics & Reporting

TIMELINE: 6 months (May - October 2024)
BUDGET: $85,000 total
- Strategy & Planning: $15,000
- Creative Development: $25,000
- Media Spend: $35,000
- Management & Reporting: $10,000

EXPECTED OUTCOMES:
- 40% increase in website traffic
- 25% improvement in lead generation
- 15% boost in brand recognition

Next Steps: Schedule presentation meeting by April 20, 2024

classes.name: Policy Document
examples:
REMOTE WORK POLICY

Effective Date: January 1, 2024
Policy Number: HR-2024-003
Department: Human Resources
Approved By: CEO Sarah Williams

PURPOSE:
This policy establishes guidelines for remote work arrangements to ensure productivity, security, and work-life balance while maintaining company standards.

ELIGIBILITY:
- Employees with 6+ months tenure
- Roles suitable for remote work
- Demonstrated self-management skills
- Manager approval required

REQUIREMENTS:
1. WORKSPACE: Dedicated, professional workspace with reliable internet (minimum 25 Mbps)
2. EQUIPMENT: Company-provided laptop, monitor, and security software
3. AVAILABILITY: Core hours 10 AM - 3 PM in company timezone
4. COMMUNICATION: Daily check-ins, weekly team meetings, monthly one-on-ones
5. SECURITY: VPN usage mandatory, confidential data protection protocols

PERFORMANCE STANDARDS:
- Maintain same productivity levels as in-office work
- Meet all deadlines and deliverables
- Participate actively in virtual meetings
- Complete monthly remote work assessment

VIOLATIONS:
Failure to comply may result in termination of remote work privileges or disciplinary action.

REVIEW: Policy reviewed annually or as business needs change.

classes.name: Memo
examples:
MEMORANDUM

TO: All Employees
FROM: David Rodriguez, IT Director
DATE: May 8, 2024
SUBJECT: Mandatory Security Training and System Updates

Dear Team,

This memo serves to inform all employees of upcoming mandatory cybersecurity training and critical system updates scheduled for the week of May 20-24, 2024.

SECURITY TRAINING:
- Online module: "Phishing Prevention & Data Protection"
- Duration: 45 minutes
- Deadline: May 31, 2024
- Access: Company learning portal
- Completion certificate required

SYSTEM UPDATES:
- Email server maintenance: May 22, 6 PM - 10 PM
- CRM system upgrade: May 23, 8 PM - 12 AM
- Network firewall update: May 24, 7 PM - 9 PM

DURING MAINTENANCE:
- Limited email access expected
- CRM will be completely unavailable
- VPN connections may be intermittent
- Emergency IT contact: (555) 123-4567

ACTION REQUIRED:
1. Complete security training by deadline
2. Save important work before maintenance windows
3. Plan alternative communication methods
4. Update passwords following new security guidelines

Questions? Contact IT Help Desk at ext. 2500 or helpdesk@company.com

Thank you for your cooperation.

classes.name: Legal Notice
examples:
LEGAL NOTICE - PRIVACY POLICY UPDATE

Notice Date: June 15, 2024
Effective Date: July 15, 2024
Company: DataFlow Technologies Inc.
Notice Type: Privacy Policy Amendment

Dear Valued Customers,

We are writing to inform you of important updates to our Privacy Policy in compliance with the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).

KEY CHANGES:
1. Enhanced data subject rights including right to deletion and portability
2. Expanded cookie consent management
3. Updated third-party data sharing disclosures
4. New data retention schedules
5. Additional security measures for personal information

YOUR RIGHTS:
- Access your personal data
- Request data correction or deletion
- Opt-out of data sales
- Data portability requests
- Withdraw consent at any time

DATA WE COLLECT:
- Account information and preferences
- Usage analytics and performance data
- Communication records
- Payment and billing information
- Device and browser information

CONTACT INFORMATION:
Data Protection Officer: privacy@dataflow.com
Phone: 1-800-555-0123
Mail: 123 Privacy Lane, San Jose, CA 95110

The complete updated Privacy Policy is available at www.dataflow.com/privacy

By continuing to use our services after July 15, 2024, you acknowledge acceptance of these changes.

Sincerely,
Legal Department
DataFlow Technologies Inc.

classes.name: Technical Specification
examples:
TECHNICAL SPECIFICATION DOCUMENT

Project: E-Commerce Platform API v2.0
Document Version: 1.3
Date: July 20, 2024
Author: Engineering Team
Approved By: CTO Lisa Park

SYSTEM OVERVIEW:
RESTful API for e-commerce platform supporting product catalog, user management, order processing, and payment integration.

TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS:

ARCHITECTURE:
- Microservices architecture with Docker containers
- API Gateway: Kong
- Load Balancer: NGINX
- Message Queue: Redis
- Database: PostgreSQL 14+ with read replicas

PERFORMANCE SPECIFICATIONS:
- Response Time: <200ms for 95% of requests
- Throughput: 10,000 requests per second
- Availability: 99.9% uptime SLA
- Concurrent Users: 50,000 simultaneous

SECURITY REQUIREMENTS:
- OAuth 2.0 authentication
- JWT token-based authorization
- TLS 1.3 encryption for all communications
- Rate limiting: 1000 requests/hour per user
- Input validation and SQL injection prevention

API ENDPOINTS:
- GET /api/v2/products - Product catalog
- POST /api/v2/orders - Order creation
- PUT /api/v2/users/{id} - User profile updates
- DELETE /api/v2/cart/{id} - Cart item removal

DATA FORMATS:
- Request/Response: JSON
- Date Format: ISO 8601
- Currency: USD with 2 decimal precision
- Character Encoding: UTF-8

TESTING REQUIREMENTS:
- Unit test coverage: >90%
- Integration tests for all endpoints
- Load testing with 2x expected traffic
- Security penetration testing

DEPLOYMENT:
- Kubernetes orchestration
- Blue-green deployment strategy
- Automated CI/CD pipeline
- Environment: AWS EKS
